alert.note: Alert for Northern Fauquier; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 11:45AM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in northern Maryland and a coating to 2 inches in northern Virginia. Ice accumulations of a glaze to one tenth of an inch, locally higher on the Blue Ridge Mountains. * WHERE...In Maryland, Northern Baltimore and Northwest Harford Counties. In Virginia, Northern Fauquier and Western Loudoun Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, sleet and freezing rain will continue today, with the most snow in Maryland counties. Precipitation will change to rain in some areas this afternoon before ending during the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
